SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi

Class ClientRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi.ClientRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface
public class ClientRMI extends Object implements ClientInterface
RMIClient Class
Handle all the network communications between RMIClient and RMIServer
From the first connection, to the creation, joining, leaving, grabbing and positioning messages through the network
by the RMI Network Protocol

    • setGoalCard

      public void setGoalCard(int index, String nickname) throws IOException, NotPlayerTurnException
      Sets the goal card for the player with the specified index.
      Specified by:
      setGoalCard in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the goal card to be set.
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.
      NotPlayerTurnException - If it's not the player's turn to set the goal card.

      Parameters:
